abstract.t: This document describes a framework for the transport of IP trafficfrom different routing realms inside a single network. In otherwords, this document describes a framework enabling a networkoperator to enable the parallel use of different IP routing realmswithin a single operated network.This framework may, for instance, be applied in the context of IPv4private networks using an address reuse technology to offer internetconnectivity or in the context of IPv4 and IPv6interworking/migration.Till now, operating multiple realms within a single physical networkwas realised by the use of tunneling technologies. This document willintroduce a non-tunnel based scheme for multiple realms interworking.
